metadata.Title: CVE-2022-35165 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue in AP4_SgpdAtom::AP4_SgpdAtom() of Bento4-1.6.0-639 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted mp4 input.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
